short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Angels of Death wallpaper turn new tab to HD Angels of Death background. Custom Angels of Death theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Angels of Death wallpapers every time you open a new tab.  
2. Randomize Angels of Death backgrounds or mark your favorites using the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Integrated Google-powered search bar for easy browsing.  
4. Quick links to access your emails and social media accounts.  
5. Automatically display the current date and time.  
6. A "New Note" feature to jot down tasks or reminders.  
7. Convenient access to your most visited websites.  
8. Quick access to your bookmarks for seamless navigation.  
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.  
10. One-click access to Google apps.  
11. Explore and switch to new themes effortlessly.  
12. Share content easily on social media platforms.  
13. Download wallpapers with a single click.  
14. Quick access to Games.  
15. Enable interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks for a fun Angels of Death new tab experience.
